entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm except 15 cm over eastern sections. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
